Edges-Warlock-Witch -- Male Human Veteran Warlock/Witch
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4-2 Performance: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Boating: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4-2
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Research: (sma) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Skill Notes: Clumsy+: -2 Athletics/-2 Stealth
Size: 0
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 6; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch); Consort; The Witching Hour; Wizard Hindrances: Clumsy+; Slow; Superstitious Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch): Has Corruption+, Familiar, Magic, and Material Components+ features
Magic: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Magic)
Superstitious: -1 on all Trait rolls if focus object or routine is disturbed
The Witching Hour: Gains free Soak and cannot critically fail between midnight and 1 a.m.
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Thick Coat Shield: None Weapons: Double-Barrel Shotgun (3d6 R12"); Gatling (2d8 R24" AP 2); Holy Water Grenade (None R5"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Slow: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Consort: May spend a Benny to cast any power via a ritual; failure triggers Corruption+
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change a Power trapping
